getKijiTable

public org.kiji.schema.KijiTable getKijiTable(String instance,
                                              String table)
Gets a Kiji table. Caller does not have to release the table as it will be released when the KijiClient is closed.

Specified by:
getKijiTable in interface KijiClient
Parameters:

Parameters:

invalidateTable

public void invalidateTable(String instance,
                            String table)
Removes the table from the various table reader caches. This happens when trying to read from a table that may have been deleted after KijiREST opened a reader for it.

Specified by:
invalidateTable in interface KijiClient
Parameters:
instance - is the name of the instance.
table - is the name of the table to remove from the cache.

refreshInstances

public void refreshInstances()
                      throws IOException
Update the instances served by this ManagedKijiClient.

Throws:
IOException - if an instance can not be added to the cache.
